i) eo4 ended in June: Yes, June 14th. True.

ii) eo2 started in February: Yes, Feb 15th. True.

iii) eo5 started two months after eo3 ended: eo3 ended on April 15th. Two months later would be June 15th. But eo5 started on July 1st, which is more than two months later. Thus iii is false.

Thus C has two correct statements (i and ii).

Therefore, the correct answer is option C, as it contains two true statements.

$\boxed{C}$
